DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study prospectively assess outcome robotic sacrocolpopexy repair pelvic organ prolapse high volume european center .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Assessment Robotic Sacrocolpopexy : European Multicentric Cohort ( PARSEC )
DOC.detailed_description: To prospectively assess outcome robotic sacrocolpopexy repair pelvic organ prolapse high volume european center . Primary outcome : anatomical cure rate ( use simplify POP-Q stag system ) Secondary outcome : complication assessment ( Clavien-Dindo ) , functional result , intraoperative variable , impact surgery quality life ( PFIQ-7 , PISQ-12 )
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic vaginal vault prolapse simplify pelvic organ prolapse quantification ( POPQ ) stage 2 great Poor health status inability undergo general anaesthesia Age < 18 year â‰¥ 3 previous laparotomic surgery Planned pregnancy Other : know pelvic malignancy , previous pelvic radiotherapy , congenital anomaly genitourinary tract , autoimmune disease connective tissue involvement ( Lupus , Sjogren Sdr , sclerodermia , etc . ) , current UTI 's , use steroid , anticoagulant , interstitial cystitis
